title: EmuDeck Store
description:
Now you can browse and download games from our homebrew collection one by one.
You can uninstall the previous HomeBrew pack from Quick Settings and just use the store to get the games you want.
On this release they are only playable on EmulationStation DE

title: UI / UX tweaks
description:
- New Confirmation ( Custom Mode ) & Post Install Status page
- New home screen after first install
- RetroAchievements for PS1 and PS2

title: New Emulators
description:
- MelonDS Standalone ( Custom Mode )
- Rosalie's Mupen GUI ( Custom Mode )
- mGBA ( Custom Mode )
- Cemu AppImage ( On Manage Emulators )
- Pico8 and tic80 RetroArch Cores

title: USB Transfer Wizard
description: Now you can easily import your roms and bios from an USB drive. You no longer need to fiddle using a keyboard and mouse, all can be easly done using the touchscreen

title: EmulationStation 2.0
description: New version of ESDE 2.0 with a new EpicNoir Theme. Go to Emulators to update it and then Reset the configuration afterwards to get the new theme upgraded

title: Manage Emulators
description: Get notifications when an emulator has a new configuration update so you don't need to reinstall EmuDeck to apply that specific configuration.

title: Migrate Installation
description: Move your EmuDeck Installation to another destination: SD Card, Internal Storage, etc.

title: Cloud Services Manager
description: Create shortcuts on Steam for cloud services like Apple TV, Disney +, Hulu, Plex but also streaming services like Moonlight or Chiaki

title: Steam Rom Manager
description: This new version of Steam Rom Manager has two new themes. EmuDeck theme designed for regular users and Deck, designed for advanced users, go to Manage Emulators and update your SRM configuration to get it!

title: Automatic Steam Input Profiles
description:
Alongside with new themes, the new version of Steam Rom Manager allow us to automatically add Steam Input Profiles, so all your 3DS, Wii U, etc. games will use the Steam Deck back buttons with no configuration. This will only affect new added games, so for already added ones you need to add them again using Steam Rom Manager.
There's also one Profile for EmulationStation! Just use the left trackpad to select the system to play.

title: Bug fixes & Small Features
description:
- Fixed PS3 Pkg parser so it doesn't grab discs in the hdd
- GyroDSU working at last.
- Steam Shortcut path bulk update
- Fix DOSBox-pure config directory
- Fix Vita3K Launcher
- Fix EmuDeck Compressor tool with rvz files
- EasyRPG SRM parser
- Recursive SRM parsers are back
- Added ESDE 2.0 beta
- CSO Format support for PPSSPP
